verbs.description: [ARG0: CBS late - night hosts Stephen Colbert and James Corden] [V: yukked] [ARG1: it] up [ARGM-LOC: at the network ’s upfront presentation in New York] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] . Colbert kicked things off with a barrage of Donald Trump jokes , as well as a few pointed references to the ongoing legal battle between Shari Redstone and CBS . Later on , Corden decided to forego the traditional monologue and instead pitch the assembled advertisers his very own show : “ Young Corden . ” Read ...
